LanguageData.Astropolitan.label: astropolitan
LanguageData.Astropolitan.description: A broad collection of cultures common among frequent space travelers.
LanguageData.Corunan.label: corunan
LanguageData.Corunan.description: An ancient culture common among rimworld tribes.
LanguageData.Rustican.label: rustican
LanguageData.Rustican.description: A hardy industrial culture common among rimworld outlanders.
LanguageData.Kriminul.label: kriminul
LanguageData.Kriminul.description: A broad category describing the styles and practices of many pirate groups.
